overview:
Scott is an entrepreneur and is currently pursuing his MBA at the University of Chicago Booth School of Business. Prior to enrolling at Booth, Scott was an associate with Austin Ventures where he evaluated venture capital and private equity investments. Before joining Austin Ventures, Scott was an associate in the mergers and acquisitions group with BMO Capital Markets. Scott began his career with Deloitte Consulting where he was a business analyst in the strategy and operations group.

Scott is also a co-founder of the City Year Chicago Associate Board and served as its Chairman for three years.
